Articles.Content:
This was my first landing in a LONG time and my first flag planted.

Look how happy Jeb looks.

Here's a picture of it on the launchpad.

EDIT: Added the picture of the rocket on the launch pad.

Edited July 4, 2013 by Baconluver25
Congratulations! That's a nice little lander you've got there.

Thanks! =D But it fails a bit in that I had to finish the encounter with the orbital pod (this was also my first Apollo style mission that was successful) with the RCS backpack, but hey, Jeb loves that kind of stuff.

Edited July 4, 2013 by Baconluver25

Congratulations!

I love that lander, and i guess Jeb too !

Where is the fueltank on that thing!?

Would you mind uploading that craft file!?

Congratulations!

I love that lander, and i guess Jeb too !

Where is the fueltank on that thing!?

Would you mind uploading that craft file!?

I wanted to make a tiny little lander, so the fuel tank is clipped inside of the cabin, it's gotta be a tight squeeze in there. And yea... I can upload, here's a tip though, you need to cut all power when you're detaching the big side tanks. During the ascent.

You can download it here.
Thanks for the download. I'll have to try that one out. I like the idea of clipping your fuel tank inside the crew pod.

I also like the design of that lifter... looks a bit "overpowered" though.

Need to try that asap

I also like the design of that lifter... looks a bit "overpowered" though.

Need to try that asap

Actually, it's what I've been using for a while, and the solid rocket boosters are just for this one because I had problems getting to the Mun without them.

TIP: Cut the throttle when you disengage the big four orange tanks or else they'll crash into the central engine and cause to then lose some nice Delta V.

TIP: Cut the throttle when you disengage the big four orange tanks or else they'll crash into the central engine and cause to then lose some nice Delta V.

Yes, Sir!

Maybe i put some Sepratrons on em just to be sure

Yes, Sir!

Maybe i put some Sepratrons on em just to be sure

There are already, they are just teeny.
That lander looks really nice, I also like that lifter, good job and that flag is just magical.
